text: Pihlajavesi is a lake in Finland. The area of the lake is 712.59 kmÂ², making it the sixth largest lake in the country. Pihlajavesi is the second-largest basin in the complex Saimaa lake system. Pihlajavesi lacks large open lake areas but has more islands than any other lake in Finland. ==References== Category:Lakes of Finland
title: Pihlajavesi (Saimaa)
